name: MaliciousMallard
0:
”Alexa, open Malicious Mallard”
”Alexa, give me some tips from Malicious Mallard”
”Alexa, ask Malicious Mallard to give me bad advice”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: malicious mallard
des:
Do you want to derail your budding career? Feel like destroying a meaningful relationship or wrecking your personal property?

If so, we have the perfect skill for you! Ask the Malicious Mallard for terrible advice that is guaranteed to ruin everything you hold dear.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
